unnormalised: Boro, mhunnlear tumi Bharotant online xikopachi bhovergyat vishayim vichartat, kiteak? Punn ti ekdum vhodd, bhai! EdTech khorench boom kortasa. Mhozo dhaktto bhav, Rohan, to hea online classank ekdom addicted zala. To sumar 8 PM voranim 10 PM voranim dor eka ratrik tutorial korta.
normalised: Bore, tumi Bharataant online shikshannache bhavishyavishayin vichartaa, barem? Bhau, tem khup vhodd aahe! EdTech gambheertaayen ud'dharannar aahe. Mhozo dhakto bhav, Rohan, hea online classancher khub dhyan deun asta. To ratri aatth vaajtaan saun dha vaajtaan pariant shiktto.

unnormalised: Tumkam tem boring textbook yaad asa? Tem ghelam! Atam soglle interactive video lessons, quizzes ani virtual reality vostunchea vishayant asa. Byju's ani Vedantu sarkheo companies xikop ani ruchik korpache yantran asa. Te marketingacherui crores khorch kortat - tumi tanchi ads soglle kodde polltat. To mhunnta ki taka Physics ani Maths atam somzunk ekdom sopem zata- to tachim sogllim testancher 85% + score korta.
normalised: Tumhi tea bore-karnnaarya pustakankaan yevnkarthat? Ti vochunkartat! Aata sagalle interactive video lessons, quizzes, ani virtual reality vastu aahe. B-Y-J-U's ani Vedantu sarke compani shiksha zhadda divpak lagtaat. Te marketingacher kharch karun koti rupeya kharch kartaat, tumhi tanche jaahirati sabdha dishtaat. To sangta ki tanne Physics ani Maths atmispaun sodpak kitlenk sukar dishtta -- tannem ashttya-panchya pashatichya boddyanchi chalaavdiki kartaat.

unnormalised: Ani tem fakt bhurgeam khatiruch nhoi. Mhoji kaki, ti 45 vorsanche umarak Udemycher coding shikta! Tika “upskill” zaun ek bore zagear kam mellounk zai asa. Ti tichem kam sompoita, jevon karta, ani magir tichem online class 9:30 PM voranim attend karta. Online shikpan khup zannank sandhi dileat zaka traditional shikop prapt korunk mellonk na. Dure astole ganvui sopya internet ani smartphonesak lagun connect zanvchea rastyar asa.
normalised: Ani tem faakt pillankankarti naka. Mhozo ant, ti challisa-panchya vachnaache vaattavartanar Udemyacher coding shikta! Ti "upskill" karonkani ek boddem kaam zoddunk zata. Ti kaamanimta, jevta, ani tanche online class noovve tea vaajtaan haajar karta. Online shikshannan zannaankankarti faaide utpanna kelelyaat jey traditional shikshannank zayanchi nashteeli. Dhokhaade gaavancheaank sudhdha swast internet ani smartphones-ank laagi joddanche vajan aahe.

unnormalised: Satya sangta mhunnlear online shikop perfect nhui. Bharotachea khup bhaganim connectivitychi problem asa. Soglleank ek bore zatiche laptop vo ek stable internet connection ghevponk mellona. Digital divide khorench asa. Magir screen timechi problem asa- khup vell devicesacher dhyan devponk lagta. Rohanachea dollyanche doctorean sanglem ki taka dor eka 20 minttanim break ghevnk zai.
normalised: Sangannem sangta ki, online shikshan nirantar naka. Bharataant anek bhaagaankani joddnani samassya aahe. Dhokhaade laptop va nirmal internet joddnaa zannaankankarti sadhy naka. Digital vargikaran saty aahe. Magir screen chokhi samassya aahe -- khoob divsaankankarti upkaraner thambnne. Rohan-ache dolyeache vaidyem sangta ki tanna dar eke visa minuteanim thambnni gheunk jaataa.

unnormalised: Ani, motivation ek challenge zaunk xakta. Gheranim xiktana distracted zaunk ekdom sopem asa. Konnui tumcher physically polloinastana asta. Teacher thoimuch nashta, tumchea dollyanim dolle ghalun! Tum discipline-an ravonk zai. Rohanachea kaim ixttanim taka sanglam ki te khup da ekdum distracted zatat ani lecture attend korchea bodlek reels pollovpak lagtat.
normalised: Ani boddi jodi samassya aastey. Ghaaricher shikshannar dukhtti gheunk saukar asa. Koni sharirakrit aatey pahaat asa. Guru tanna aatey usvaashnani karta! Tumhi disciplined rahanaa asa. Rohan-ache dhaktten tanna saangta ki te anek boddi dukhtti ghetat ani upkaraner reels pachantaat padtaat lecturerer haajar kellya.

unnormalised: Punn overall, mhaka dista online shikop ani EdTech ithai ravonk asa. Tem flexible asa, sopem asa ani konnakui mellonk xakta, kiteakui thaim. Tem xikpachi rit ani amchi shikpache vishayim dhaklli vichar badolta. Kitlem internet fast ani sopem zata ani kitle zannank technology mellta, online shikop kitlench vhodd zata. Mhojem prediction? 2025 vorim, sumar 50% Bharatiya vidyarthi online shikpache ek form vapurtale, primary school-antlean post-grad vorim.
normalised: Pan sakal, mhane sangta ki online shikshan ani EdTech hyaa thaavarik rastaar asaa. Tem flexiblen, swast aahe, ani zannaankanka, konnanankankarti sudhdha boddi aahe. Tem shikshannaache prakar ani shikshannaache bhavishi vicharenak bodlun vartan kartaa. Ji taknik sudharsha ani swast dishtaan, ani jannaankannakarti dhokhaade upkaran dishtaan, online shikshan zadda aahe. Mhaje bhavishyachi vichartaa? Dolhaad dolhisaari panchya, Bharataache pashatichya vidyartim online shikshannachi prayoga kartaat, dhaada vaadyankanchya saatvaartaan paasoon uchya shaletankartaa.
